name: Carving Reaper
description:
Carving Reaper Description

Death needs a vacation! Good thing that skiing is really dangerous. Now he can combine duty with leisure time. 

Features
  • Carve around various obstacles
  • Party to the "Après Ski" beat
  • Reap skiers on vacation and listen to their screams
  • Get that high score
Controls KeyboardControllerMovement:WASD or arrow keysLeft StickSlash:SPACE or left mouse buttonRT or A or X Contributors
  • Philip Hell (Programming)
  • Dennis Nikolay (Programming)
  • Van An Nguyen (Character Animation)
  • Regina Krämer (UI & VFX)
  • Vladislav Hnatovskiy (Soundtrack & Level Art)
  • Teflora (Sound Effects)

Made with Godot Engine
